text: Pochard include the following species of diving ducks: *Three species in the genus Aythya: ** Common pochard, Aythya ferina ** Baer's pochard, Aythya baeri ** Madagascar pochard, Aythya innotata * Three species in the genus Netta: ** Red-crested pochard, Netta rufina ** Rosy-billed pochard or Rosybill, Netta peposaca ** Southern pochard, Netta erythrophthalma
title: Pochard
